idea-plugin.name: SLF4J
idea-plugin.description:
IDE support for the SLF4J compiler plugin.
  • Resolves generated logger companion object property for @Slf4j-annotated classes
  • Gutter icon on @Slf4j classes showing generated logger
  • Quick documentation (Ctrl+Q) for generated logger property
  • Inspection warning when manually defining logger in companion of @Slf4j class
idea-plugin.change-notes:
1.0.0
  • Bundled FIR compiler plugin provider for K2 analysis
  • Gutter icon line marker for @Slf4j classes
  • Documentation provider for generated logger property
  • Inspection for conflicting manual logger definitions

localInspection.displayName: Manual logger conflicts with SLF4J generated logger
